message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! It's a game-changer in its industry and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $8000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $11000. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit shy of the $11000 mark. Would you be willing to consider $9500?
I understand that you're still a bit hesitant, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $10500. That's as low as I can go without losing money on the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get the best deal possible. Would you be willing to consider $9800?
I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob. I've already compromised a lot, and I'm not sure I can go any lower. But I'll make one more offer. I can do $10200. That's my final offer.
I understand you're frustrated, but I'm still willing to work with you. Would you be willing to consider $9500?
I've already told you, Bob, $10200 is my final offer. I'm not willing to go any lower. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'm afraid we're at an impasse.
